actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 43 of title 38, United States Code, to provide for the treatment for the purposes of pension benefits of the absences of certain veterans who are reemployed under that chapter.

summary.text: Provides that, for purposes of the right to receive, as well as the amount of, any Federal, State, or private employee pension benefit under a pension benefit plan, a person who is absent from his or her employment for more than 45 days due to military service or training and who is restored to such employment shall be considered to have been continuously employed in that position during the entire period of such service or training.

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 43 of title 38, United States Code, to provide for the treatment for the purposes of pension benefits of the absences of certain veterans who are reemployed under that chapter.
